title: I AM WOMAN: Baby Mama Drama
description:
I AM WOMAN | Season 2: Episode 3

In Episode 3, Michi Marshall, Kijafa Vick, Aja Crowder, Sharelle Rosado and Alexis Welch give there take on what it takes to make a bended family work. Sharelle opens up and shares what has worked for her and Chad “OchoCinco” Johnson’s blended family. She believes that communication plays a major role in it’s success and gives first hand advice to others in similar situations. Kijafa shares here perspective and stresses the importance of women “letting go” in relationships to be able to begin putting the children and family first. 

The conversation shifts as the women share if they would date a man with children from a previous relationship in they were single. 

Chef Tre joins in and serves up “Brookies” for the cast while giving his personal take on blended families and dating women with children from previous relationships. 


WATCH MORE → https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLG...

FOLLOW US ON:
Instagram | https://instagram.com/iamathletepodcast
Twitter | https://twitter.com/IAMATHLETEpod
Website | https://houseofathlete.com

#BrandonMarshall
#MichiMarshall
#AjaCrowder
#KijafaVick

#AlexisStoudemire
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Fred Taylor, Chad Johnson, Channing Crowder, Brandon Marshall)
